name: Windex
description: WinDex is a binary options exchange built on a decentralized blockchain platform. All are transparent and fair, with a vast data source from the world's leading exchanges, a team of experts, and a professional WinDex platform builder. With a good marketing strategy, WinDex will quickly become a unicorn in the global financial market. Swap your cryptocurrency trading with all the knowledge you know about trading. Exchange the value of money that you can choose as much as you want and instantly.
